intro: Hi, I'm Hazik and I'm a London based software engineer focused on creating high quality web and mobile applications
I specialise in frontend and backend web technologies such as React and Node.js, as well as Android (TV and Mobile) development in both Java and Kotlin
Keeping up with the latest technology trends and design practices, I'm able to apply a unique design bearing during development to ensure that end users are getting the best user experience possible
Have a look at some of my past work and feel free to drop me a message if you think we could work together! :)
